      • getAttributeName

        public static String getAttributeName(org.hibernate.annotations.common.reflection.XMember member,
                                      String name)
        Get attribute name out of member unless overridden by name.
        Parameters:
        member - XMember from which to extract the name.
        name - Override value which will be returned in case it is not empty.
        Returns:
        attribute name out of member unless overridden by name.

      • createXClassHierarchy

        public static List<org.hibernate.annotations.common.reflection.XClass> createXClassHierarchy(org.hibernate.annotations.common.reflection.XClass clazz)
        Creates the class hierarchy for a given XClass.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class for which to create the hierarchy
        Returns:
        the list of classes in the hierarchy starting at java.lang.Object

      • containsSearchAnnotations

        public static boolean containsSearchAnnotations(org.hibernate.annotations.common.reflection.XClass mappedClass)
        Checks whether the specified class contains any Search-specific annotations.

        This method will return true if such an annotation is detected in the class itself or in one of its superclass, either applied directly on the class, on a field, or on a method.

        Parameters:
        mappedClass - the XClass to check for Search annotations
        Returns:
        Returns true if the class contains at least one Search annotation, false otherwise

      • isSearchAnnotation

        public static boolean isSearchAnnotation(Annotation annotation)
        Checks if the annotation is a Search annotation by comparing the package of the annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the annotation is a Search annotation, false otherwise

      • createInstance

        public static Object createInstance(Class<?> clazz,
                                    boolean checkForFactoryAnnotation)
        Creates an instance of the specified class and returns it. If checkForFactoryAnnotation == true, the created instance is checked for a @Factory annotated method. If one exists the factory method is invoked and the return value returns as expected instances.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to instantiate
        checkForFactoryAnnotation - whether to check for @Factory annotated methods
        Returns:
        the created instance

      • isFloatingPointType

        public static boolean isFloatingPointType(Class<?> type)
        Checks whether the specified type is a floating point type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to check
        Returns:
        true if the specified type is an floating point type or a wrapper thereof. false otherwise.

      • isIntegerType

        public static boolean isIntegerType(Class<?> type)
        Checks whether the specified type is a integer type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to check
        Returns:
        true if the specified type is an primitive integer type or a wrapper thereof. false otherwise.
